entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
